attributes.action: stop the introduction of Sahria law and abolish the existing ones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop sharia courts that is operating in England (about 85 as of now). One law for all and no discrimination. This will protect the vulnerable in that society and speciallyl women.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
